scripts.new:note:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const title=process.argv[1] || 'New Note'; const slug=title.toLowerCase().replace(/ /g, '-'); const template='---
title: "'+title+'"
date: "'+new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]+'"
tags: []
summary: ""
---

## Context(상황)
'; if(!fs.existsSync('./content/notes')) fs.mkdirSync('./content/notes', {recursive:true}); fs.writeFileSync('./content/notes/'+slug+'.md', template); console.log('Created note: ' + slug);"
scripts.new:project:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const title=process.argv[1] || 'New Project'; const slug=title.toLowerCase().replace(/ /g, '-'); const template='---
title: "'+title+'"
period: ""
role: ""
stack: []
summary: ""
links: { github: "", demo: "" }
---

## Problem
'; if(!fs.existsSync('./content/projects')) fs.mkdirSync('./content/projects', {recursive:true}); fs.writeFileSync('./content/projects/'+slug+'.md', template); console.log('Created project: ' + slug);"
